Definition.WordDefinition: BENEFACTOR, n. One who makes heavy purchases of ingratitude, without, however, materially affecting the price, which is still within the means of all.

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Benefactor \Ben`e*fac"tor\,n. [L.] One who confers a benefit or benefits. --Bacon. [1913 Webster]
benefactor n : a person who helps people or institutions (especially with financial help) [syn: {helper}]
